content: Welcome to Bored ArmyBored Army is a group of characters who are tired of playing the same game over and over. Now they are free to play whatever game they want and be rewarded with real money.Collect, Play and EarnDesigned with a economy that brings the best of free to play and play to earn, Bored Army are collectible NFTs that allow you to earn without forgetting the main focus which is to have some fun playing!A single NFT, multiple gamesDesigned with a economy that brings the best of free to play and play to earn, Bored Army are collectible NFTs that allow you to earn without forgetting the main focus which is to have some fun playing!NFTs rares and uniqueEach NFT has unique details and features that make them truly rare. Armor, weapons, hair, facial expressions, and other items allow for an infintiy amount of combinations, making your NFTs perfect collectibles.Be Ready! Coming soon! https://youtu.be/C3BQUpSFuNwOfficial Links:WebsiteDiscordInstagramYouTubeTwitter
